description: Join multiple audio streams into multi-channel output.
name: join

options.description: The number of input streams. It defaults to 2.
options.name: inputs

options.description: The desired output channel layout. It defaults to stereo.
options.name: channel_layout

options.description: Map channels from inputs to output. The argument is a ’|’-separated list of mappings, each in the input_idx.in_channel-out_channel form. input_idx is the 0-based index of the input stream. in_channel can be either the name of the input channel (e.g. FL for front left) or its index in the specified input stream. out_channel is the name of the output channel.
options.name: map
